We are so grateful to LifeKind for the excellent quality of your organic mattresses, blankets, pillows, mattress protectors and sheets. We have been purchasing our bedding from LifeKind for the past ten years. It is reassuring to know that our bedding is chemical free, and at the same time beautifully made. Thank you, LifeKind for your fine products and your friendly, reliable and professional customer service. Barbara B. Sublime comfort ... From my beautifully supportive box-spring foundation, to my luxury cotton sheets and soft, soft, soft weighted blanket - to even my shampoos and conditioners - nothing I have purchased here at LifeKind has been anything but sublime. My box-spring foundation is built so well that an elephant could sleep on it and it wouldn't make a dent. My sheets, combined with my weighted blanket, are so soft and comfortable that I sleep better - and longer - than I have in years. And the shampoo + conditioner? My hair is so pretty, smooth and soft that I can't stop running my hands through it after it's washed. To be honest, if I ever need any other bedding or another box-spring foundation? I'll not shop anywhere else - because yes - I love what I've purchased that much! Nicole 01/08/2024 Soft, organic, perfect! Our home is outfitted with bedding from lifekind. The cotton sheets and duvet covers are buttery soft and the quality is great. I shopped another brand when bedding was sold out here and that other company's sheets were not nearly as soft and lovely. Customer service has been fantastic too when I've reached out with questions. A. Softest sheets These are the softest organic sheets I have ever used!  I'm very happy to have found them. Lynne T. thought: The content extracted from the website suggests it is an organic and natural products site. It claims to offer certified organic mattresses and bedding, along with a range of organic personal care products. It mentions certifications like GOTS and Indoor Advantageâ„¢ Gold, which are legitimate certifications. The site also offers customer service options, such as a phone number, chat, and social media links, and has a section for customer reviews. However, to determine if it's fraudulent, I need to verify the legitimacy of these claims and check for any red flags.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain lifekind.com is registered with GoDaddy, has been in existence since 1998, and is not due to expire until 2026. The use of a privacy service (Domains By Proxy, LLC) is common for legitimate businesses wishing to protect their privacy. The domain age suggests a well-established site, which is less typical of fraudulent sites.

thought: The search results show reviews and information about Lifekind, with mentions of their organic latex mattresses and other organic products. There are reviews from different sources, including Slumber Search and Yelp, with generally positive comments about the firmness of the mattresses and the organic gift baskets. The presence of multiple reviews from different sources, along with the information about manufacturing at their California-based Eco-Factory, suggests a legitimate business operation rather than a fraudulent site. Based on the website content, WHOIS information, and external reviews, there are no immediate red flags indicating that Lifekind is a fraudulent site. It appears to be a well-established business with a focus on organic and natural products. The domain has a long history, there are legitimate certifications mentioned on the site, and there is a variety of customer feedback available online. I now know the final answer. The URL https://lifekind.com/ does not appear to be a fraudulent site.

observation.reason: The site has been in existence since 1998 with a consistent focus on organic products and holds legitimate certifications like GOTS. The WHOIS information shows a well-established domain and there are multiple positive reviews from external sources suggesting that it is a legitimate business.
